name: 传送到异世界开后宫
description:
Lorens was transported to other worlds by magic and involved in a series of strange events before he could stand firm. Can he solve these problems successfully and then return to his own world?
On the way, Lorens met a lot of girls with different personalities. For various reasons, we started to travel together. What interesting experiences would Lorens and several girls have?
In the game, players can experience unique and relaxed stories without using their brains. There is no NTR in them, so they can rest assured of the game.
This game is a 2-D pixel style RPG game, but CG is still very beautiful.

PS. No English, excuse me
